title: Hot Topic • EP121
itunes:title: Hot Topic • EP121
description:
Hilarie, Sophia, and Joy share honest opinions about Haley discovering pornography on Nathan's computer which leads to an important discussion about intimacy and addiction. 

 

People always leave? Jake certainly is! But why and when will he be back??


Mall rats! Where was YOUR fav mall hotspot?

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
